advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
The latest video game news and reviews, piped into your pocket from the world's #1 source, IGN. A must-have app for gamers, movie buffs and comic junkies that need to know what's new and which products are worthy.

The official IGN app for iOS features:

- Customizable news feed -- Keep up on the latest, from PlayStation 4 to Xbox One and beyond
- Video game and movie reviews -- Research the best buys in games, movies and comics
- iOS Calendar integration -- Add release reminders for games to your iOS calendar
- Wiki guides and walkthroughs -- In-depth support for getting through Destiny, Skyrim, Call of Duty and more
- IGN video shows, with AirPlay support

Universal app works on iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.
trackCensoredName: IGN: Video Game News, Reviews, Guides
trackName: IGN: Video Game News, Reviews, Guides
releaseNotes:
Fellow IGNers!

In addition to various bug fixes to improve app performance, we’ve included something special in this update:

Fully revamped Wiki Guides are now out in the wild!*

The IGN app is now the perfect companion to help you beat your games, whether you’re raiding in Destiny or playing through the GTA 5 campaign again in beautiful high-res. 

New features for game guides include:

- Brand new look & feel, more usable and easy to read!
- Native Wiki Guide navigation and super-fast page filtering
- Integrated search within Wiki Guides

Just keep an eye out for the “book & pencil” Wiki Guide icon throughout the app to get access to the new content. If you have ideas on how to make our game guides better, let us know in the feedback link under Settings. Thanks!

*WIKIWILDWIKIWIKIWILDWILDWESTJIMWESTDESPERADO
